title: Clean & Simple Watch Face Free
summary: Free version of Clean and simple digital and analog watch face.
description: Simple and clean Android watch face demo is specially designed for easy everyday use.See the full version Clean & Simple Watch Faces fore more featuresFeatures• easy to read watch faces;• unique clearly readable date which does not hide itself behind the clock hands on analog watch face;• analog watch face;• digital watch face at ambient mode;• ambient mode dims in 5 minutes to prevent burn in and increase battery life;• 24 hours military, 12 hours with or without am/pm digital watch face;• special design for round, Moto 360 and square watchYou need phone and Android Wearable app to install this watch face, but you do not need your phone to configure the watch, it is directly customizable on your watch! Just long press the watch face to change it and click the configuration button below it.
descriptionHTML:
Simple and clean Android watch face demo is specially designed for easy everyday use.

See the full version Clean & Simple Watch Faces fore more features

Features
• easy to read watch faces;
• unique clearly readable date which does not hide itself behind the clock hands on analog watch face;
• analog watch face;
• digital watch face at ambient mode;
• ambient mode dims in 5 minutes to prevent burn in and increase battery life;
• 24 hours military, 12 hours with or without am/pm digital watch face;
• special design for round, Moto 360 and square watch


You need phone and Android Wearable app to install this watch face, but you do not need your phone to configure the watch, it is directly customizable on your watch! Just long press the watch face to change it and click the configuration button below it.
comments: Please fix the ambient mode (always on screen)
recentChanges: Fixed digital clock does not show am/pm marker properly.
